oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Graphical representation of equilibria in aqueous system
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VENKATACHALAM, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diagrams
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Graphical representation of equilibria in aqueous systems are often useful in studying the dissolution of a solid phase or the precipitation of a consistuent from solution. Potential-pH diagrams and activity-activity diagrams are of great relevance to hydrometallurgy. The applications of such diagrams are discussed. Construction of potential -pH diagrams, particularly the computer programmes are explained.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: TRANSACTIONS OF THE INDIAN INSTITUTE OF METALS, 49(6), 851-857
